_description: Sorrow at parting, sometimes ascribed to John Skelton — three 8-line stanzas

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
Petyously constraynyd am Iwith wepyng yes to morne& playne
                    that we soo nyof progeny so sodenlyshulde part twaynewhen ye ar
                    gon comfort ys none…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines:
…there may no wyght make my hert lyghttyll I haue A syght of
                    yow A gayne
